context: Zillow Group, Inc. is a real estate technology company focused on real estate marketplace, rentals, and home services. iBuying expansion with Zillow Offers.

competitors.name: Opendoor
competitors.notes: iBuying market leader, sold 9,193 homes in 2020, $2.6B revenue

competitors.name: Offerpad
competitors.notes: Second largest iBuyer, 5,337 homes sold in 2020

competitors.name: Redfin
competitors.notes: RedfinNow iBuying service, 25%+ of 2020 revenue from iBuying
